stocks.impact_theory: Cadence reported Q4 earnings beating estimates with $1.44B revenue and $1.99 EPS, up YoY, driven by AI chip design demand. backlog $7.8B signals visibility. Economic implications: boosts semi sector growth amid AI capex. Market psych: relief rally post recent weakness. Historical: similar to 2023 AI boom beats. Analogies: like a dam breaking after pressure (earnings backlog), or rocket fuel igniting (AI tailwinds).

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Strong beat and FY26 guidance above consensus, KeyBanc OW PT $405. X sentiment positive on backlog/AI. Premarket +7% confirms shift.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Buy for 10-15% gains to $330+, target resistance break.
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Broader tech selloff, high valuation compression.

stocks.justification: Clear earnings catalyst, analyst support, volume surge.

stocks.impact_theory: Rises in sympathy to CDNS earnings, NVDA 13F holding $2B stake. Econ: EDA tools critical for AI semis. Psych: sector rotation to winners. Hist: peers move together post-earnings. Analogies: rising tide lifts boats (EDA duo), echo effect (CDNS beat ripples).

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Premarket +3.3%, NVDA stake news. X positive on alignment. Competitor strength lifts.

potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Awaits own earnings Feb 25, AI hype fade.

stocks.justification: Sympathy play, NVDA validation, but no direct catalyst.

stocks.impact_theory: Mizuho upgrade to OP $195 PT, citing unique growth/margins. Econ: AI platform demand accelerates. Psych: de-rating complete, FOMO returns. Hist: upgrades spark 10%+ moves. Analogies: undervalued gem rediscovered (multiple compression), phoenix rising (post-pullback).

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Upgrade highlights revenue accel, X buzz on PT. Premarket +3%.

potential_profit_risks.short_position: High valuation risk if growth slows.

stocks.justification: Prestigious upgrade, strong X sentiment shift.

stocks.impact_theory: Meta deal for Blackwell chips, easing AI fears. Econ: $115-135B capex validates demand. Psych: rebound from weakness. Hist: partner deals lift 5-10%. Analogies: fuel to fire (AI ecosystem), domino effect (Meta spurs others).

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Premarket mover, Meta commitment. Mixed X but positive on holdings.

stocks.impact_theory: Q2 beat but cut FY26 EPS guide to $3.65-3.70 on AI/deal costs. Econ: cyber spend up but margins pressure. Psych: disappointment despite revenue raise. Hist: guidance misses cause 5-10% drops. Analogies: sugar high crash (beat then guide), speed bump (acquisitions).

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Guidance below exp despite rev beat, premarket -6%. X sees overreaction but downside.

stocks.justification: Beat but guide key, mixed analyst views.
